model_response.head: cusparseSetMatIndexBase
model_response.description: Sets the index base for the matrix descriptor.

model_response.head: cusparseSetMatType
model_response.description: Sets the matrix type for the matrix descriptor.

model_response.head: cusolverSpCreateCsrqrInfo
model_response.description: Creates an empty info structure for the QR factorization.

model_response.head: cusolverSpXcsrqrAnalysisBatched
model_response.description: Performs symbolic analysis for sparse QR factorization in a batched manner.

model_response.head: cusolverSpDcsrqrBufferInfoBatched
model_response.description: Provides the buffer size required for numerical factorization in a batched manner.

model_response.head: cusolverSpDcsrqrsvBatched
model_response.description: Solves Aj*xj = bj in a batched manner using sparse QR factorization.

model_response.head: cusolverSpDestroyCsrqrInfo
model_response.description: Destroys the info structure used for QR factorization.
